The Clean Goal

See the documentation for the Ant task: wsit-clean and clean goal parameters for details on available settings.

Example:

    ...
    <build>
        ...
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>com.github.wsitbt</groupId>
                <artifactId>wsit-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.0.8-SNAPSHOT</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>doClean</id>
                        <phase>generate-resources</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>clean</goal>
                        </goals>
                        <configuration>
                            <file>TestService.xml</file>
                            <todir>myMojoITestOutputDir</todir>
                        </configuration>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
            ...
        </plugins>
        ...
    </build>
    ...
